links.title: 10 Stock Picks And Flicks From The Market-Savvy 'Shark Tank' Stars - (OUSA), Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL)
links.description: Stars of ABC's hit reality show "Shark Tank" Mark Cuban and Kevin O'Leary sometimes argue over the merits of an entrepreneur's offer, but one thing they agree on is using stock investing to build portfolio value. O'Leary, a frequent guest on CNBC, recently celebrated the one-year anniversary of his O'Shares FTSE U.S.

links.title: Streetwise Professor
links.description: I've long been an Elon Musk/Tesla skeptic, to put it mildly. I've called him out as a crony capitalist who milks subsidies, and as a con man. Most recently, I said that one Musk company's (SpaceX) purchase of the debt of another Musk company-Solar City-should raise alarms. Well, today four alarms rang: Tesla bid to take over Solar City, and to pay for the acquisition in Tesla stock.

links.title: Tesla rushes to complete 'gigafactory' before Model 3 rollout
links.description: SPARKS, Nev. - Tesla Motors Inc. is scrambling to finish building its massive $5 billion battery factory here years ahead of schedule to meet demand for its coming cheaper sedan and provide power for new types of vehicles Chief Executive Elon Musk says are under development.

messages.body: $TSLA look at the price targets from this article http://www.com-unik.info/global-equities-research-reiterates-overweight-rating-for-tesla-motors-inc-tsla/

links.title: Global Equities Research Reiterates Overweight Rating for Tesla Motors Inc. (TSLA)
links.description: Tesla Motors Inc. (NASDAQ:TSLA)'s stock had its "overweight" rating restated by analysts at Global Equities Research in a report released on Sunday. They currently have a $385.00 price target on the electric vehicle producer's stock. Global Equities Research's target price would indicate a potential upside of 73.21% from the stock's current price.

links.title: The Route Powertrain | Wrightspeed Powertrains
links.description: The Wrightspeed Route™ is a Range-extended Electric Vehicle (REV) replacement powertrain that can be customized to fit a variety of today's heavy-duty truck platforms, replacing both the engine and the transmission. Advantages of the Wrightspeed Route™ Powertrain The Wrightspeed Route™ electric powertrain drives more low-end torque to the wheels than conventional diesel engines, with less fuel, less emissions, and less noise.

messages.body: $TSLA $SCTY lets all not forget the lives saved here by Tesla Autopilot https://youtu.be/9X-5fKzmy38

links.title: Tesla Autopilot saves the day
links.description: Add your own honking and swearing. Was travelling a little under 45 mph. There was some rain, but roads were pretty dry. I was watching stopped traffic to my right. I did not touch the brake. Car did all the work. Sadly no audio, because I had an Uber passenger and Washington has strict privacy laws about recording conversations.
